definition: to offend Heaven and reason (idiom); bloody atrocities that cry to heaven/outrageous acts
to injure/injury/wound
day/sky/heaven
to do harm to/to cause trouble to/harm/evil/calamity
texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up

sentences.english: But people for money to do if the terrible thing shouldn't.
sentences.chinese: 但人們如果爲了錢去做傷天害理的事就不應該了。

sentences.english: How could he live peacefully with such a wicked crime on his conscience?
sentences.chinese: 他做了這樣傷天害理的事怎麼能過太平的日子呢？

sentences.english: I want to help, but there is a tyranny involved.
sentences.chinese: 我想幫你的忙，但是這牽涉到一樁傷天害理的事。

sentences.english: Would our Chinesev government do something as impudent and outrageous as peddle munitions?
sentences.chinese: 販賣軍火傷天害理的事情怎麼是我們中國政府做的呢？

definition: traitor to one's love/heartless rat
to follow the path to one's own doom (idiom)/to bring about one's own destruction
lit. small belly, chicken's gut (idiom); narrow-minded/petty
lit. either the fish dies or the net splits/a life and death struggle (idiom)
trivial matter/a piece of cake
to procure/to act as pimp
to wish for the whole world to be in chaos (idiom)

definition: variant of 敢做敢當|敢做敢当[gan3 zuo4 gan3 dang1]
to bite the hand that feeds one (idiom)
lit. not even the chickens and dogs are left undisturbed (idiom)/fig. great commotion/pandemonium
lit. to stand with each foot in a different boat (idiom)/fig. to have it both ways/to run after two hares/(especially) to have two lovers at the same time
to make fun of/to seek diversion
devoid of conscience (idiom); utterly heartless
annoying/disgusting
to extort under false pretenses/to blackmail/to bluff/to defraud
foolish talk/nonsense
